metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9187 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
ikiwiki before 3.20170111.1 and 3.2018x and 3.2019x before 3.20190228 allows SSRF via the aggregate plugin. The impact also includes reading local files via file: URIs.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9187` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ikiwiki - 3.20190228-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20190228-1').
